timeline.bodyText: I think we want overwite || overwrite here?
timeline.author: bdelbosc

replies.bodyText: And it misses some unit tests to validate that both parameters work as expected :)
replies.author: troger

timeline.message: NXP-29286: rename the parameter "overwite" of FileManager.Import to "overwrite"

timeline.bodyText: Better to use Folder as type for a parent document :)
timeline.author: troger
troger

timeline.bodyText:
Tests are on error on your PR (https://jenkins.platform.dev.nuxeo.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/nuxeo%2Fnuxeo/detail/PR-4221/2/pipeline):
[2020-07-17T16:23:51.496Z] [ERROR] testFileImport(org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.core.operations.services.TestFileManagerImport)  Time elapsed: 0.049 s  <<< ERROR!
[2020-07-17T16:23:51.496Z] org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.InvalidChainException: Cannot find any valid path in operation chain - no method found for operation 'FileManager.Import' and for first input type 'org.nuxeo.ecm.core.api.impl.DocumentModelImpl'

The operation input is a Blob, not the parent document. The parent document should be passed as a currentDocument context variable.
See TestFileManagerImportWithProperties#testNoteCreationWithProperties for instance.
timeline.author: troger
ataillefer

replies.bodyText: It was the first idea, but what about the deprecation part then?
replies.author: BoboTiG

replies.bodyText:
Indeed, but it seems simpler to use aliases that were made for this purpose, and not have the deprecated member in the logic part.
I think it's OK that the compatibility is kept forever, or when we remove the deprecated member we could also simply remove the alias.
replies.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: There is no title parameter for the FileManagerImport operation.
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: I guess setting a description is not strictly needed here.
timeline.author: ataillefer
ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: Could be removed since it's included by the next assertion.
timeline.author: ataillefer
ataillefer
ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: Could be removed since it's included by the next assertion.
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.message: NXP-29286: rename the parameter "overwite" of FileManager.Import to "overwrite"

timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText:
I'm wondering if this test could not be removed since this case is tested by the above test.
You could simply include the inline comment in the above test.
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: We usually add blank lines between fields.
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText:
In fact, I'm wondering if we should not keep the deprecated field, along with using an alias, just to make sure someone possibly extending this class won't have its compilation broken.
@troger WDYT?
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.message: NXP-29286: rename the parameter "overwite" of FileManager.Import to "overwrite"

timeline.bodyText:
Can you please replace this by a Java constant, aka:
protected static final String FILE_NAME = "foo.txt";

Same thing for filePath -> FILE_PATH.
These 2 fields should be placed before the other members, at the very top of the class.
timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: I removed them completely as they are used only one time.
replies.author: BoboTiG
